title: Herbs & Products - California College of Ayurveda
description: CCA is pleased to offer a full selection of bulk herbs, custom formulations & herbal products to support our practitioners and patients. Please visit our Shanti Shop for bulk herbs and accessories.
cleaned_text: The California College of Ayurveda is pleased to offer a full selection of ayurvedic and western bulk herbs, custom herbal formulations and products to support our practitioners and patients in their health needs.
